Hello! I'm trying to animate a function using GLMakie, and I've hit a wall immediately. The issue I'm having is that when trying to follow the examples from the makie section on julia plots, I get a BoundsError: attempt to access Scene at index [3] on line 5 here:

```using AbstractPlotting
using GLMakie
using AbstractPlotting.Colors

figure, ax, lineplot = lines(0..10, sin; linewidth=10)

# animation settings
n_frames = 30
framerate = 30
hue_iterator = LinRange(0, 360, n_frames)

record(figure, "color_animation.mp4", hue_iterator; framerate = framerate) do hue
lineplot.color = HSV(hue, 1, 0.75)
end```
This is code I've taken word for word from the example (except the using AbstractPlotting).
I've tried what little troubleshooting I know how to do, but no success. Any ideas what I'm doing wrong?
